title: Sigur Rós Add North American Dates to Orchestral Tour
description: Shows in Los Angeles, San Francisco, Vancouver, and other cities comprise the final North American leg of the tour
author: Jazz Monroe
excerpt: Shows in Los Angeles, San Francisco, Vancouver, and other cities comprise the final North American leg of the tour
text: Sigur Rós have announced the final leg of their orchestral tour to take place in North America. The shows with conductor Robert Ames and Wordless Music Orchestra extend an ongoing run behind 2023 album Átta and also coincide with 20th anniversary celebrations for Takk, a press release notes. Find the band’s full itinerary—including European dates with various local orchestras—below, along with a 2024 live version of “Andvari” and a trailer for the tour.Sigur Rós:09-03 Prague, Czech Republic - KCP09-04 Prague, Czech Republic - KCP09-06 Vienna, Austria - Wiener Konzerthaus09-07 Vienna, Austria - Wiener Konzerthaus09-09 Milan, Italy - Teatro Arcimboldi09-10 Milan, Italy - Teatro Arcimboldi09-12 Rome, Italy - Sala Santa Cecilia09-13 Rome, Italy - Sala Santa Cecilia09-16 Wroclaw, Poland - Hala Stulecia09-19 Tallinn, Estonia - Alexela Kontserdimaja09-20 Tallinn, Estonia - Alexela Kontserdimaja09-23 Brussels, Belgium - Bozar09-24 Brussels, Belgium - Bozar09-26 Paris, France - Salle Pleyel09-27 Paris, France - Salle Pleyel09-28 Paris, France - Salle Pleyel09-30 London, England - Royal Albert Hall10-01 London, England - Royal Albert Hall10-02 London, England - Royal Albert Hall10-03 London, England - Royal Albert Hall10-05 Amsterdam, Netherlands - Carré10-06 Amsterdam, Netherlands - Carré10-07 Amsterdam, Netherlands - Carré11-02 San Diego, CA - Jacobs Music Center11-04 Phoenix, AZ - Orpheum Theatre11-07 Denver, CO - Mission Ballroom11-10 Edmonton, Alberta - Winspear Centre11-12 Vancouver, British Columbia - Queen Elizabeth Theatre11-14 Portland, OR - Theater of the Clouds11-16 San Francisco, CA - Orpheum Theatre11-17 San Francisco, CA - Orpheum Theatre11-19 Los Angeles, CA - Orpheum Theatre11-20 Los Angeles, CA - Orpheum Theatre
html:
Sigur Rós have announced the final leg of their orchestral tour to take place in North America. The shows with conductor Robert Ames and Wordless Music Orchestra extend an ongoing run behind 2023 album Átta and also coincide with 20th anniversary celebrations for Takk, a press release notes. Find the band’s full itinerary—including European dates with various local orchestras—below, along with a 2024 live version of “Andvari” and a trailer for the tour.

Sigur Rós:

09-03 Prague, Czech Republic - KCP
09-04 Prague, Czech Republic - KCP
09-06 Vienna, Austria - Wiener Konzerthaus
09-07 Vienna, Austria - Wiener Konzerthaus
09-09 Milan, Italy - Teatro Arcimboldi

09-13 Rome, Italy - Sala Santa Cecilia

09-20 Tallinn, Estonia - Alexela Kontserdimaja
